name: consistencyIndexAllChars
script:
require(phangorn)
require(aRbor)
td <- make.treedata(tree, table)

aType<-detectAllCharacters(data.frame(td$dat))
ft<-filterMatrix(data.frame(td$dat), aType, "discrete")
result<-dim(ft)

result<-numeric(dim(ft)[2])
for(i in 1:dim(ft)[2]) {
  dd<-ft[,i]
  dd<-as.factor(dd)
  names(dd)<-rownames(ft)
  pd<-phyDat(as.matrix(dd), type="USER", levels=levels(dd))
  result[i]<-CI(td$phy, pd)
}
result<-cbind(colnames(ft), result)
colnames(result)<-c("Variable", "Consistency index")
